name: Draconis Hull
desc: Hidden hullmod for managing the special properties of Draconis ships. Description created in script.

name: Forty Second Battlegroup
desc: Hidden hullmod for managing the special properties of XLII Defence Fleet ships. Description created in script.

name: Missile Control Matrix
desc:
Features an onboard missile autoforge that periodically makes ammo for the twin large missile weapons.

Additionally, all missiles have their hitpoints increased by %s.
short: Increases missile health; slowly regenerates ammo for large missile weapons.

name: Targeting Systems
desc: A built-in advanced fire control optimized for quick targeting over maximum range. Increases missile weapon ammo regeneration and charge rate by %s, but reduces missile range by %s.
short: Decreases missile weapon range but increases ammo capacity.

name: Advanced Ballistic FCS
desc: This ship has an experimental hull-integrated ballistic computer, linking all weapons through a compact targeting array that consumes significant internal volume. Increases the range of ballistic weapons by %s.

name: Adaptive Flux Matrix
desc:
Experimental flux-feedback matrix that routes rising flux levels into offensive and defensive systems. Increases damage dealt by %s at low flux, scaling linearly to a maximum of %s at high flux. Provides damage reduction starting at %s and scaling to a maximum of %s.

The unstable feedback loop interferes with ship systems, increasing system cooldown by %s.
short: Increases ship systems effectiveness as flux rises.

name: Monofilament Tow Cable
desc: Stabilises the fleet's drive bubble, increasing the maximum burn of the fleet by %s. The effect of multiple stabilisers is cumulative.

name: Improved Subsystems
desc: Enhanced power routing and mechanical redundancies developed to help sustain excessive system usage. Increases the maximum number of ship system charges by %s and reduces system cooldown by %s.

name: Incomprehensible Horrors
desc:
Autonomous repair systems embedded in the ship's modular armor plates, activated via the ship system. Regenerates up to %s of maximum hull integrity over the duration. Healing scales with remaining intact armor modules; each destroyed module reduces total regeneration by %s.

Additionally reduces ship system cooldown by %s and prevents engine flameouts from damage.

If all armor modules are destroyed, no hull regeneration occurs.
short: Regenerates hull when system active; scales with intact modules.

name: Headache ECM Suite
desc: Hidden hullmod for managing the Headache ECM Suite aura. Description created in script.

name: Alliance Trained Crews
desc: Draconis Alliance crews receive specialised training in electronic warfare and benefit from improved support management, reducing combat readiness lost per deployment by %s and increasing the chance for incoming missiles to lose lock by %s.
short: Increase ECM effectiveness against missiles and decreases CR loss per deployment.

name: Phase Torpedo Array Automod
desc: Hidden hullmod for ensuring charges are always even when gaining additional charges for symmetrical torpedo spawning.
short: Phase Torpedo Array system charges rounded to even numbers.
